name: d3-composite-projections
description: Like the AlbersUsa projection, adds several d3 projections to show the countries that are far from the mainland close to it.

scripts.pretest: rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-geo:d3,d3-path:d3 -n d3 -o d3-composite-projections.js -- index.js
scripts.test: tape 'test/*-test.js' && mkdir -p test/output && test/compare-images && eslint index.js src
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" d3-composite-projections.js -c -m -o d3-composite-projections.min.js
